main event: On July 29th, 1952, two observers reported seeing two round luminous objects over Los Angeles that appeared to be blue-green in color, traveling at a high altitude and speed.
interesting points: The objects were described as being compact and round, with a pale blue-green color that seemed to be about the size of a dime at arm's length., They were sighted around 11:01 PM and lasted about 14 minutes., Observers reported the objects moved in a generally straight course at an estimated speed of 500 to 700 mph., The objects did not leave any smoke trails or show regular navigation light patterns typical of aircraft., The sighting occurred under clear sky conditions with visibility at 7 miles.
witness description: Observers reported M.S. and D.D., who corroborated the sighting.
